source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_00<tab>Now apprised of the situation, Nahbdeen is eager to take action.
target: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_00<tab>ハンサ牧場跡のナブディーンは、状況を整理している。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_01<tab>As Nahbdeen resolves to instruct the people to seek shelter, you offer to investigate Khadga, where the fiend that arose from the Bhaflau remnants is believed to be. Grateful for the help, the Radiant commander suggests that you speak with the quarry workers at the Giantsgall Grounds, which is situated at Khadga's base. Apparently, a man named Qetanur is likely to know one of the paths to the summit.
target: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_01<tab>ナブディーンは、カドガの大岩への道を知っている人がいるかもしれないと教えてくれた。ギガントガル採石場の「ケタヌール」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_02<tab>According to Qetanur, a rockslide may have rendered the primary path nigh impassable. Thankfully, one of his fellow quarry workers, Sramul, is said to climb like a langur, and may know an alternate route.
target: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_02<tab>ケタヌールは、よりカドガの大岩への道について詳しい人を紹介してくれた。ギガントガル採石場の「スラマル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_03<tab>Though initially reluctant to send you headlong into danger, Sramul shows you an alternate trail that leads to the mountaintop. And so you begin your climb to ascertain who or what has made its nest atop Khadga.
target: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_03<tab>スラマルはカドガの大岩への道を教えてくれた。「カドガの大岩」へと向かい、飛来したものの正体に迫ろう。

source:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_04<tab>At the summit of Khadga, you come face-to-face with the archfiend of fire, Rubicante. While the coming battle promises to be difficult, you can but hope that victory will bring you one step closer to uncovering Golbez's scheme.

※Mount Ordeals can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_04<tab>封宝の間のヴォイドゲートは、宝物殿ごと破壊されていたと、ヤ・シュトラから連絡があった。その先で待ち構えていたゴルベーザ四天王の一角、「ルビカンテ」を討伐しよう。
カドガの大岩へは、ギガントガル採石場の「スラマル」が案内してくれるようだ。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_05<tab>Rubicante rains fire upon you and your comrades, but his flame soon flickers and fails. Battered and beaten, the archfiend offers to tell you his lord's grand design, confident that the knowledge will not change the outcome.
target: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_05<tab>ルビカンテを討伐した。カドガの大岩で、ルビカンテの目的を問おう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_06<tab>Golbez is intent on invading the Source, that the denizens of the void may be granted true death and return to the Lifestream. The revelation rattles Zero, who chastises the archfiend for his methods in pursuit of release. For pride and honor, Rubicante then reveals where Golbez and Azdaja may be found: on the moon of the Thirteenth.
target: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_06<tab>ルビカンテは消滅間際に、ゴルベーザの目的は止まった命を終わらせるために原初世界へと攻め入ることであると話し、ゼロはそんな彼らの思想に異を唱えた。そしてどうやら、アジュダヤとゴルベーザはヴォイドの月にいるらしい。一度ギガントガル採石場へと戻り、「ゼロ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_07<tab>Though she understands Rubicante's motivations, it remains to be seen if Golbez is driven by a similar hunger. Indeed, with his dying breath, Rubicante suggested that his lord harbors a desire all his own... Regardless, Zero believes there is a better way forward, a future she hopes to one day see made reality.
target: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SEQ_07<tab>ゼロと話し、ルビカンテが最期に残した言葉に想いを馳せた。ゴルベーザの真なる想いとはいったいどんなものなのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Qetanur at the Giantsgall Grounds.
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_010<tab>Confound it. We were so concerned with the explosion that we failed to recognize that the threat had not yet passed!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_010<tab>クソッ、爆発自体に気を取られていたが、
その話が本当なら、脅威はすでに上陸してるってわけか！

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_011<tab>We must alert command at once and instruct the people to seek shelter.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_011<tab>本部に報告を……
それから、最悪の事態に備えて、
周辺住民を避難させる手はずも整える必要がある。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_A1_000_001<tab>Is there a way to the top of Khadga?
target: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_A1_000_001<tab>「カドガの大岩」にはどう向かう？

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_A1_000_003<tab>I'll go and see if the fiend is indeed there.
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_014<tab>What? You mean to go there to investigate!?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_014<tab>どうって……まさかひとりで向かうつもりか！？
そりゃあ、お前なら大丈夫だとは思うが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_016<tab>But there is no telling what manner of enemy this may be!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_016<tab>任せろって……
もしかして、現地に向かってくれるのか？

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_100_016<tab>Then again...you are more than capable of defending yourself... As you wish. We will leave this in your hands.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_100_016<tab>……そういうことなら、
緊急時だ、おとなしく力を借りるとしよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_017<tab>The Giantsgall Grounds are situated at the base of Khadga. I myself am not familiar with the mountain paths, but the quarry workers are bound to know many.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_017<tab>「カドガの大岩」のふもとは、ギガントガル採石場だ。
そこで採掘をしている作業員たちは、
大岩まで登れる獣道なんかを知っているかもしれない。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_019<tab>Qetanur, for instance─he has worked there the longest. Go well, my friend, and may the Sisters keep you.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_019<tab>ひとまず、そこで長く働いてる「ケタヌール」って奴に、
話を聞いてみてくれ。
くれぐれも無茶はするなよ！

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_030<tab>If someone can tell you how to scale Khadga, it will be Qetanur. Seek him out at the Giantsgall Grounds.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_030<tab>ギガントガル採石場の「ケタヌール」なら、
俺たち以上に「カドガの大岩」を熟知してるはずだ。
行って、話を聞いてみてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_QETANUR_000_040<tab>You want to climb Khadga!? You couldn't have chosen a worse time...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_QETANUR_000_040<tab>ええっ、カドガの大岩に登りたいって！？
よりにもよってこんなときに、なんでまた。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_QETANUR_000_041<tab>There was an earthquake earlier, and it triggered a rockslide. I'm afraid the main path to the summit may be blocked.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_QETANUR_000_041<tab>さっきとんでもない地響きが起こってよ、
なにかが大岩に落ちてくるのを見たんだ！
いつも登るのに使ってる道も、崩れちまってるかもしれねぇ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_QETANUR_000_042<tab>But if you're determined to go, then I suggest you speak with Sramul. He climbs like a langur, and might know some other way up, if not the gentlest.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_QETANUR_000_042<tab>どうしてもって言うなら、「スラマル」に相談してみな。
あいつなら、多少道が途切れてたとしても、
大岩を登りきれるだろうからよ！

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_QETANUR_000_050<tab>If you commit to climbing Khadga, take care not to slip. Most routes were treacherous before, and I don't dare to imagine how they are now.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_QETANUR_000_050<tab>大岩に登るなら、足を滑らせないように注意するんだぞ。
普段でも足場が悪いのに、
さっきの衝撃でどうなってることやら……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_055<tab>I thank you for your offer of help. I pray the Sisters speed your way to the summit─and keep you safe from whatever you find there.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_NAHBDEEN_000_055<tab>現地に向かってくれて助かる。
が、くれぐれも無茶はするなよ！

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SRAMUL_000_060<tab>How to reach the top of Khadga!? After what has happened, that should be the last place anyone sane would want to be...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SRAMUL_000_060<tab>カドガの大岩に登らせてほしいだって……！？
あそこはとんでもなく高くて、おっかないところだぞ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SRAMUL_000_061<tab>But yes, I am familiar with another route that should still be passable. I was once afraid of heights, you see, and used it to build up my courage.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SRAMUL_000_061<tab>まぁ、たしかに登る道筋は知ってるけどさ。
高いところが苦手だったもんで、
慣れるために何度も登る練習をしたんだよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SRAMUL_000_062<tab>Though I cannot say I have the courage to brave it under these conditions! I'll take you to where the route starts, but no further, all right?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SRAMUL_000_062<tab>島を救ってくれた恩人でもある、あんたの願いだ。
どうしてもって言うなら、登り口まで案内してやるけど……
くれぐれも気をつけなよ？
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_Q2_000_063<tab>「カドガの大岩」に向かいますか？

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SRAMUL_000_070<tab>I can show you where my route to the top of Khadga begins, but you'll have to head up there on your own. Some may call me a coward, but they will not call me a fool.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_SRAMUL_000_070<tab>「カドガの大岩」へ行きたいのか？
登り口まで案内してやるけど、くれぐれも気をつけなよ！
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_Q2_000_071<tab>「カドガの大岩」に向かいますか？

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_080<tab>My inquiries delayed me. I'm not accustomed to conversation.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_080<tab>……慣れない聞き込みなんぞをしたせいで、
戦いに間に合わなかったじゃないか。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_081<tab>But I'm glad I arrived in time to speak with Rubicante...
target: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_081<tab>だが、ルビカンテと最期に言葉を交わせたのは幸運だった。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_082<tab>As much as I understand his motives, I believe there's a better way─yours.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_082<tab>ヴォイドの救済を謳いながらこの世界を奪おうとする彼らと、
対価なしに人になにかを与えようとするお前たちとは……
明らかに見据える未来が違う。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_083<tab>The future you strive for is one I wish to see.
target: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_083<tab>私は……お前たちが切り開く未来の方が興味深い。

source: TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_084<tab>And I want to know why I feel this way. Why this fire burns in my breast.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMJ108_04677_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_084<tab>そして、なぜ自分がそう思うのか。
私はそれが知りたいんだ。
